data.headline: Junior Product Manager with Academic Research Experience
data.summary: Driven and analytical junior product manager with a background in academic research. Skilled in data analysis, user research, and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about delivering innovative products that solve real user problems. Seeking to leverage my research expertise and product management skills to drive growth and impact at a dynamic tech company.

experience.title: Product Management Intern
bullets: Conducted user research to identify pain points and opportunities for a new mobile app
Collaborated with the engineering team to define product requirements and prioritize features
Developed and tested product prototypes, gathering feedback from users to refine the design

experience.title: Research Assistant
bullets: Assisted with the design and execution of multiple research studies, contributing to the publication of 2 peer-reviewed articles
Analyzed complex datasets using statistical software, identifying key trends and insights
Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team of researchers to develop research proposals and secure funding

experience.title: Product Management Intern
bullets: Supported the product development process for 3 early-stage startups, including user research, prototyping, and feature prioritization
Gained experience in Agile methodologies, participating in daily stand-ups and sprint planning sessions
Presented product updates and recommendations to the startup founders and accelerator leadership team

projects.name: Predictive Analytics for Retail
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to forecast product demand and optimize inventory management for a leading retail chain, resulting in a 12% reduction in stockouts and a 7% increase in revenue.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Smiling, well-lit, neutral background.
